\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
\&\&\& {\mathscr C\cap \mathscr F} \\
{\,} \&\& {\pi (\mathscr C\cap \mathscr F)} \&\& {\frac{\mathscr C\cap \mathscr F}{\mathscr C\cap \mathscr W \cap \mathscr F}} \&\& {\,}
\arrow[from=1-4, to=2-3]
\arrow[from=1-4, to=2-5]
\arrow[dashed, from=2-5, to=2-3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
